      • putAttachment

        public static void putAttachment(java.lang.String id,
                                 java.io.File file,
                                 java.lang.String attachmentName,
                                 java.lang.String contentType)
        Adds an attachment to a CouchDB document.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the document.
        file - File with content of attachment.
        attachmentName - The name assigned identifying the attachment.
        contentType - Describes the type of data. e.g. "application/pdf". An exception is thrown if the file does not exist. An exception is thrown if the file object exists but is a directory. An exception is thrown if the file exists but cannot be read.

      • putAttachment

        public static void putAttachment(java.lang.String id,
                                 java.io.InputStream data,
                                 java.lang.String attachmentName,
                                 java.lang.String contentType)
        Adds an attachment to a CouchDB document.
        Parameters:
        id - The CouchDB _id of the document.
        data - A string with content of the attachment.
        attachmentName - Identify the attachment within the database.
        contentType - Describes the type of data. e.g. "application/pdf".

      • getAttachment

        public static AttachmentInputStream getAttachment(java.lang.String id,
                                                  java.lang.String attachmentID)
        Reads an attachment from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the document.
        attachmentID - The name assigned identifying the attachment.

      • writeAttachmentToFile

        public static void writeAttachmentToFile(java.lang.String id,
                                         java.lang.String attachmentID,
                                         java.lang.String filePath)
                                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                         java.io.IOException
        Reads an attachment from the database, copying the result into a file. If the file already exists, it will be overwritten.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the document.
        attachmentID - The name assigned identifying the attachment.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • getAttachmentAsFile

        public static java.io.File getAttachmentAsFile(java.lang.String id,
                                               java.lang.String attachmentName)
        Returns a temp File with the contents of the attachment. The caller should delete this file.
        Parameters:
        id - The CouchDB id of a document.
        attachmentName - The name of an attachment to that document.
        Returns:
        A file with contents of attachment, or null on failure.

                                                                                throws java.io.IOException

      • idFromKey

        public static java.lang.String idFromKey(java.lang.String views,
                                         java.lang.String view,
                                         java.lang.String key)
        Returns the value of a view with a given key. The name assumes that the view is organized by keys, with each key unique, and the value has the _id of the CouchDB document. If the key is not unique to the view, only the first value is returned.
        Parameters:
        views - Design document name
        view - View funcetion name
        key - key we search for.
        Returns:
